A proclamation against persons being in arms at field-conventicles, superscribed by His Majesty at Whitehall, the 6th. day of May, 1679. Scotland. Privy Council.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : coat of arms.
By the heir of Andrew Anderson, [Edinburgh : 1679]
Caption title. Imprint of publication suggested by Folger Shakespeare Library. Includes royal coat of arms above title. Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
